p.d: A young 25 year-old man has brought charges against his uncle for wanting to appropriate the plantation his grandmother had bequeathed him, even though he never showed the slightest interest in it during her lifetime! Directed by: Anselm Nfa (Ivory Coast, season 2, 2019) Cast: Sonia Aka (judge Savhera), Fredy Alain Gires Ayemou (officer Wanderma), Dehe Ange Kader (officer Sandro) Genre: comedy drama
